about_the_game:
Season Pass 2 gives you access to special training from 9 different masters, including Zabuza Momochi! Learn new Ninjutsu from each master and receive special items.

SEASON PASS 2 INCLUDES:
• Master Character Training Pack #10 - Zabuza Momochi
• Master Character Training Pack #11 - Haku
• Master Character Training Pack #12 - Ohnoki
• Master Character Training Pack #13 - Eight Tails Jinchuriki
• Master Character Training Pack #14 - Sasuke Uchiha (Boruto)
• Master Character Training Pack #15 - Ino Yamanaka
• Master Character Training Pack #16 - Might Guy
• Master Character Training Pack #17 - Mei Terumi
• Master Character Training Pack #18 - Naruto Uzumaki (BORUTO)

SEASON PASS 2 BONUS:
Includes Top-Secret Training Zabuza Momochi.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
